item.title: Help Coding few things
item.dc:creator: @TranScape TranScape
item.description:
@TranScape wrote:

commands go into client.java
press control+f and type in master there should be a command look for the last { after that add

if (command.startsWith(“notedbarrows”) && playerRights >= 1)
{
addItem(4717, 1000);
addItem(4719, 1000);
addItem(4721, 1000);
addItem(4723, 1000);
addItem(4709, 1000);
addItem(4711, 1000);
addItem(4713, 1000);
addItem(4715, 1000);
addItem(4754, 1000);
addItem(4756, 1000);
addItem(4758, 1000);
addItem(4760, 1000);
addItem(4746, 1000);
addItem(4748, 1000);
addItem(4750, 1000);
addItem(4752, 1000);
addItem(4733, 1000);
addItem(4735, 1000);
addItem(4737, 1000);
addItem(4739, 1000);
addItem(4727, 1000);
addItem(4729, 1000);
addItem(4731, 1000);
addItem(4725, 1000);
}

or something of that nature ok well basicly the 4739 and all the 1st numbers are the item ids. and the playerRights >= 1)
mean that player rights 1-4 can do it now if u make it like this playerRights ==0) or compleatly remove it anyone can do it
